fxInfo_label: Lower chamber effective number of electoral parties
fxInfo_clarification: The effective number of electoral parties in a country’s party system at the national level for the specified election year. This is calculated at the national level following Laakso and Taagepera’s (1979) specification for elections to the lower or unicameral chamber of the legislature. Leave this question blank if election was nonpartisan, i.e., no parties (not even pro-government parties) were allowed.
fxInfo_question: In this election to the lower (or unicameral) chamber of the legislature, what was the effective number of parties by share of votes?
name: e_ellonmpe
